Best Halong Bay Tours 2017

Duration: 4 days/ 3 nightsCombo: +

Luxury Duo: Sofitel Legend Metropole + Paradise Cruise

  • Hanoi
  • Halong Bay
  • Hanoi
From
$690
What's Included

Luxury Duo: Sofitel Legend Metropole + Paradise Cruise

  • Round trip airport pick up and drop off
  • 2 night stay at premium room- Sofitel Legend Metropole
  • 1night stay at deluxe cabin - Paradise Luxury Cruise
  • Return pick up and drop off by private car from hotel to cruise and back

Price Excluded:

  • Visa arrangements
  • Beauty & spa services
  • Other beverages, tips and personal expenses
  • All other services not clearly mentioned in the inclusion list
  • Peak season surcharge $50/person applies for travel date from 01 October to 31 December, 2016

Treat yourself to the most luxurious combination that Hanoi and Halong Bay have to offer: the hundred year old Sofitel Legend Metropole and Halong's most luxury voyage on Paradise Luxury.

Duration: 4 days/ 3 nightsCombo: +

Family Getaway: Somerset Hotel + Orchid Cruise

  • Hanoi
  • Halong Bay
  • Hanoi
From
$360
What's Included

Family Getaway: Somerset Hotel + Orchid Cruise

  • Round trip airport pick up and drop off
  • 2 night stay at 2 bed room apartment - Somerset Grand Hotel
  • 1night stay at triple cabin - Orchid Cruise (upgrade to family cabin at extra cost)
  • Return pick up and drop off by shared luxury limousine from hotel to cruise and back

Price Excluded:

  • Visa arrangements
  • Beauty & spa services
  • Other beverages, tips and personal expenses
  • All other services not clearly mentioned in the inclusion list

What is better than having a great family vacation with luxury accommodation, unique cruise trip and good food? Celebrate your family love with our package: Somerset Grand and Orchid Cruise.

Duration: 4 days/ 3 nightsCombo: +

Summer Sizzling Deal: Mercure Hotel + Aphrodite Cruise

  • Hanoi
  • Halong Bay
  • Hanoi
From
$260
What's Included

Summer Sizzling Deal: Mercure Hotel + Aphrodite Cruise

  • 2 night stay at Mercure La Gare Hotel / Superior room
  • 2 day 1 night trip to Halong Bay on Aphrodite Cruise/ Luxury window cabin
  • Breakfast at hotel and all meals on board
  • Transfer round trip Hanoi - Halong Bay - Hanoi by shuttle bus
  • Complimentary spa treatment at Spas Hanoi (60 minute each)

Price Excluded:

  • Airport transfer, visa, airfare
  • Tips, Drinks

It's simply a can-not-be-missed deal this summer 2017: a stay at Mercure La Gare, a trip on Aphrodite, and a complimentary spa treatment. It is a 4 day 3 night trip to remember.

Discover Halong Bay Top Destinations

No trip to Vietnam will be complete without a visit to Halong Bay. Known as the UNESCO World Heritage Site, Halong Bay appeals to world-wide tourists by its picturesque natural scenery.

More testimonials

Serving thousands of tourists visiting Halong Bay each year, we are proudly the most specialized tour agency for Halong Bay. Travellers and professionals worldwide appreciate us for:

  • Knowledge: Highly experienced consultants with local insights
  • Service: Outstanding service with a heart and many smiles
  • Trust: We guarantee your satisfaction and deliver tours as promised
  • Value: You get the most and the best value for your trip
  • Protection: We do our best to protect your interest in whatever circumstances
  • Flexibility: Tour customization and free trip cancellation up to 15 days before departure
